Small fixes and tweaks.
Finally managed to sort the hint crashing issue. This was a tricky one as it was hard to reproduce due to it only happening on some devices. Thank you for being patient!

Small fixes and tweaks.
Finally managed to sort the hint crashing issue. This was a tricky one as it was hard to reproduce due to it only happening on some devices. Thank you for being patient!

* Removed Corona Analytics for full GDPR compliance.
* New Glitch Adventure splash screen.
* New Glitch eyeCon.
* New scrolling photo album. Please check the Options > Camera menu to adjust its settings.

* Ratings are incredibly helpful for independent developers, we've now made it easier for you to leave them, whilst also making it easier for you to get in contact with us if you have an issue. Don't worry though, you can tell the popup to go away if you

* Fixed issue with selecting the note from your inventory.
* Added an extra Close button to the photo album to ensure you can always close it.
